"Fine loser, I'll let you up" she says through the most patronising of snickers, before adding "I suppose you did earn it with all of that slobbering over my feet".

"Well, loser, I lied, didn't I?" she says with a grin, leaning right down to look you in the eyes, her nose almost brushing against your own. You grow aware of a few of her friends scooting closer for a better look, large smiles strewn across their faces and you consciously become aware that you're at her mercy and feel rather exposed.

"What...what are you going to do to me Melissa?" you whine helplessly.

She lifts herself slightly, making you believe that she was only messing with you a little bit more and was going to let you go. Though, before the thought has barely entered your mind, she slams herself down right on your stomach, bringing forth a cry of pain from your lips as your relaxed tummy takes the full brunt of the force.

"Ha, whatever I like. I own you, remember? You're my bitch, you said so yourself" she mutters with glee, before poking her tongue out at you, right in your face.

You have no response, just the physical shame being displayed via your changing skintone. She takes the moment to lift her right foot, bringing it up between her arms and resting her sweaty sole upon your face. You try to shake it off by rattling your head from side to side. She responds by lifting it slightly then bringing it forcefully down on your face; the ball of her foot crashing against your nose and bringing tears to your eyes against your will.

"Keep still" she orders, before slamming her foot down again, bringing the heel in contact with your mouth.

The pain is intense, and you can't help but let a whine escape from your lips. The girls around you chuckle in amusement, and there are a few sniggers and voices of encouragement for Melissa to do it again.

"Kiss it" she demands, and you do, with obedience, frightened that she'll stomp your face in a repeat performance.

You can see the beaming smile upon her face through her toes, and it makes you grimace. She's having such fun at your expense and her friends are loving every moment of it. You've never been so humiliated in your life.

"And again!" she commands, "and do it like you mean it! I want to see you adore your owner."

You let your lips touch the sole of her foot delicately and give it the gentlest of kisses. You feel the weight of her foot ease up in response, and with her encouraging words, you kiss all over the sole while she guides it around over your face, finishing with a peck on the tip of her big toe as she presents it before your lips.

"Good bitch" she says with mocking praise, and her foot leaves your face to return to your side, bringing her face close to yours again as she leans over you. Her smirk is undeniable and she's clearly never had so much fun in her life, which is worrying as you're praying this is a one off.

"I'll tell you what; I'm going to give you a choice. If you agree to be my personal slave from now on, you can show us all so by cleaning my stinky feet right now...with your tongue!

"You're insane! There's no wa..." I cry in disbelief, bringing forth a repeat performance of her stomach-bashing with that peachy bottom of hers, cutting me off mid-sentence and making me lose my breath.

"It's your decision. Either you lick clean your little sister's dirty feet, and I expect a good job, and accept your new place in life, or you just stay down there and keep suffering. Maybe I'll even have some of my friends here hold you down while I jump on your face." She smiles, while briefly looking up at her friends and laughing as one asks if they can do that too.

"But know this my new little bitch. Neither way will be easy. I'll expect a devoted slave to his new master, and I'll work you so hard." she laughs, while her eyes glance off to the left in thought.

"And, of course, as my slave, anything you own is mine, including your money" she adds, cocking her head to the side and showing me a massive grin in response to your mouth gaping open. She then lets a trickle of spit linger in a line from her mouth towards yours, and you freeze in horror, in total disbelief that she's going to actually do this to you, especially in front of all of her friends.

Just as the saliva is about to enter your mouth, she sucks it back into hers and lets out the most screeching of laughs, so amused by her freedom to tease and torture you. You are far from amused however, and you try to struggle against her hands, but from your position there is no leverage and you can't escape. It only brings back her attention and she adds extra weight to her upper body.

"So make your decision bitch" she asks without any hint of playfulness. "Be my personal slave or get beaten the hell out of you by all of us, right here, right now, and we'll make it painful. Hey, maybe we'll even film it and make a nice little movie" she laughs, while offering you a wink of her eye in a mocking gesture.

You take a moment to think it over; neither option is desirable, but you're not sure you can take much more humiliation. However, you're aching all over and feeling drained. Your stomach is in agony, and you're convinced that your face is beginning to swell up. You're already trying to think up ideas of how you're going to explain this to your friends.

Her dirty, sweaty soles come to rest about an inch above your face, and she dips one slightly to slap you across the cheek with it, bringing you to her attention.

"I'm waiting loser..."
